thread.title: Britain marks a century of votes for women

title: Britain marks a century of votes for women
text:
Britain marks a century of votes for women 4:58pm GMT - 01:36 
A hundred years after Britain's suffragette movement won the decades-long battle to give women the right to vote, their legacy and determination continues to inspire generations. Lucy Fielder reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A hundred years after Britain's suffragette movement won the decades-long battle to give women the right to vote, their legacy and determination continues to inspire generations. Lucy Fielder reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2BGGHad
